description:
Go farther, climb higher and ski better. Stiff but flexible, the Backland Pro Boots are in their natural habitat on fast ascents and faster descents. With an incredible 74 degrees of mobility, skinning and bootpacking isn't a sufferfest. Plus you can remove the tongues for even more comfort on the way up, and slide them back in for the ride back down. The liners are insulated and sculpted for female feet, offering you a performance-engineered boot for ambitious ski days, tours and whatever falls in between.

  • Prolite construction in the shell and cuff provides support and power transmission
  • Removable tongue increases comfort during ascents
  • Platinum liner with Ultrathon foam is thermo-mouldable, hand washable and fast drying
  • Liner support zones in calf, ankle and tongue improve downhill performance
  • Free/Lock 4.0 mechanism allows 74-degree range of motion for walking
  • Frictionless pivot uses polymer bushings to move naturally in walk mode
  • Boa Fit System adjusts quickly and easily
  • Rockered rubber sole walks like an alpine boot
name: Atomic Backland Pro W 100 Ski Boots - Women's
